Title: Relates to prohibiting facial recognition technology to be used in connection with an officer camera
Summary: Prohibits facial recognition technology to be used in connection with an officer camera used by both local and state police including the storage of biometric data.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting facial recognition technology to be used in connection with an officer camera; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
